title: If I Could Only Wear Nordstrom Pieces This Month, These 35 Standouts Would Be Top of Mind
author: Jennifer Camp Forbes
text: Sometimes I consider the idea of exclusively wearing pieces from one retailer to help deal with decision fatigue when shopping for a new season. Nordstrom often comes to mind since it is known for providing a mix of affordable, classic, and of-the-moment pieces with a constant arrival of new finds. With that in mind, I set out to create a roundup of standouts that I would be comfortable with and excited to wear if I had to exclusively wear Nordstrom picks for a month this summer.My final curated list ended up being filled with chic basics including elevated tops, effortless bottoms like classic jeans and skirts, as well as a variety of pretty dresses. There are a few trendier items mixed in when it comes to the jewelry, butter-yellow pieces, and especially the shoe styles. Keep scrolling to check out 35 editor-approved picks worth shopping this season. Many are discounted thanks to early access to the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale that starts on July 12. & Other Stories Cotton & Linen Blend Vest MANGO Beaded Drawstring Bucket Bag I sense a mini-beaded-bag trend on the horizon. Open Edit Everyday Linen Blend Pants Open Edit Tori Kitten Heel Sandal Levi's 501 High Waist Mid Thigh Denim Shorts Obsessed with these jean shorts. Monica Vinader Aria Cord Necklace Open Edit Drape Back Sleeveless Top This also comes in white. JW PEI Medium Hana Faux Leather Tote JW Pei bags just look expensive. WAYF Magnolia Sleeveless Midi Dress I can't get enough of this color and print. Open Edit Cotton Poplin Maxi Skirt Vince Barcelona Jelly Cage Mule Ettika Set of 3 Stretch Cuffs Nothing like classic Levi's jeans. Steve Madden Cary Heeled Sandal Mule sandals have my attention. Princess Polly Karuka Eyelet Trim Tank & Shorts Set Madewell Handwoven Leather Tote City Chic Leila Tie Back Top A simple yet stunning summer top. Levi's Ribcage High Waist Straight Leg Jeans Steve Madden Tracie Kitten Heel Flip Flop Another jelly sandal I am eyeing. WAYF Violetta Polka Dot Ruffle Sleeve Dress MANGO Point Collar Oversize Cotton Button-Up Shirt Ettika Rooted Vines Medium Hoop Earrings ELOQUII Wide Leg Pull-On Pants Comfy yet chic black pants. Tony Bianco Christine Slingback Sandal I want every version of these. Favorite Daughter The Favorite Strapless Maxi Dress More buttery-yellow goodness. MANGO High Waist Denim Bermuda Shorts These shorts can easily be dressed up or down. Madewell Chunky Metal Leather Belt Madewell Linen Maxi Slip Skirt Yosi Samra Kaia Slingback Kitten Heel Sandal Snakeskin sandals are a personal favorite. Reformation Archie Organic Cotton Blend Jersey Tank Yet another standout yellow piece. MANGO Large Braided Leather Shoulder Bag EDIKTED Sarafina Capri Pants TKEES Twiggy Ankle Strap Sandal Barely there sandals feel rich. SANDRO Mini Pleated Suit Dress
html:
Sometimes I consider the idea of exclusively wearing pieces from one retailer to help deal with decision fatigue when shopping for a new season. Nordstrom often comes to mind since it is known for providing a mix of affordable, classic, and of-the-moment pieces with a constant arrival of new finds. With that in mind, I set out to create a roundup of standouts that I would be comfortable with and excited to wear if I had to exclusively wear Nordstrom picks for a month this summer.

My final curated list ended up being filled with chic basics including elevated tops, effortless bottoms like classic jeans and skirts, as well as a variety of pretty dresses. There are a few trendier items mixed in when it comes to the jewelry, butter-yellow pieces, and especially the shoe styles. Keep scrolling to check out 35 editor-approved picks worth shopping this season. Many are discounted thanks to early access to the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale that starts on July 12.
